ComicInfo.Summary:
The boys try to save time and effort while shoveling Uncle Percy's front walk, but everything they try goes wrong.
When Doodles watches a television show about raising children he starts to wonder if he is raising his nephew correctly and ends up spoiling a birthday surprise the boys were planning.
Muggsy tries to trick the boys into paying for everything at the county fair but they eventually get their money back.
Muggsy fights a bear thinking it's Rollo and Rudy in disguise, but it turns out the bear is real.
ComicInfo.Tags: Mugsy Mole,Uncle Percy,Doodles Duck,Rollo Raccoon,Rudy Raccoon,Binky Biggs,Allergy,Raccoon Kids
ComicInfo.Title: Snow Joking!
